code: import React,{useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function MedicineSearch(){const[name,setName]=useState("");const[results,setResults]=useState([]);const[error,setError]=useState("");const handleSearch=async()=>{const token=localStorage.getItem("token");if(!token){setError("You must be logged in.");return;}try{const res=await axios.get(`https://mediconnect-app.onrender.com/api/medicines/search?name=${name}`,{headers:{"x-auth-token":token}});setResults(res.data);setError("");}catch(err){console.error(err);setError("Error fetching data");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\uD83D\uDD0E Medicine Search"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Enter medicine name",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSearch,children:"Search"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{color:"red"},children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:results.map((med,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[med.name," - Stock: ",med.stock||"N/A"," - Pharmacy: ",med.pharmacy_name||"Unknown"]},idx))})]});}export default MedicineSearch;
